files.title: Overview
files.summary: This document describes PTX, a low-level *parallel thread execution* virtual machine and instruction set architecture (ISA). PTX exposes the GPU as a data-parallel computing *device*.

files.title: 1.1. Scalable Data-Parallel Computing using GPUs
files.summary: Driven by the insatiable market demand for real-time, high-definition 3D graphics, the programmable GPU has evolved into a highly parallel, multithreaded, many-core processor with tremendous computational horsepower and very high memory bandwidth.
